citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 pm on
19-Apr-18. The licensee was contacted by phone after arriving at the facility. She indicated she was away from the
facility and would not be returning for a couple of hours.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 pm on
19-Apr-18.  The licensee was contacted by phone after arriving at the facility.  She indicated she was away from the
facility and would not be returning for a couple of hours.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
